name: Neon Tentaclaw
description: The Neon Tentaclaw resembles a grotesque cross between a giant rat and an octopus. Its body is covered in slick, bioluminescent scales that pulse with shifting neon colors, while its six thick tentacles are tipped with razor-sharp claws made of fused metal and bone.

flavor.rationale: The Neon Tentaclaw evolved from common sewer rats that scavenged near an abandoned cybernetics lab. Exposure to discarded nanites and bio-luminescent chemicals caused them to mutate, gaining their neon coloration and developing tentacles as a means of manipulating objects and defending themselves in the darkness.
